mapper.sql: c.id as c_id, c.grade as c_grade, c.user_id as c_user_id, c.movie_id as c_movie_id
mapper.insert: insert into comment (id, grade, user_id, movie_id, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{grade,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{movieId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
